mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_NOTICE(ID, ADMIN_ID, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_IMAGE_NAME, NOTICE_IMAGE_UUID, NOTICE_IMAGE_SIZE) VALUES(SEQ_NOTICE.NEXTVAL,#{adminId}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, #{noticeImageName}, #{noticeImageUuid},#{noticeImageSize} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(N.ID) FROM TBL_USER U JOIN TBL_NOTICE N ON U.ID = N.ADMIN_ID
